overview: The adventures of two buddies, Alik and Lyolik. Alik is an encyclopedic example of a Ukrainian homo-sovieticus: he loves salo and vodka, speaks in wild surzhyk and has a tattoo of Joseph Stalin on his chest. Lyolik is also a homo sovieticus: he always wears an ushanka and cannot imagine his life without bribes and corruption schemes.
title: About Alik and Lyolik
